page.title: 11ALEXANDRA & HOLLYWOOD PARKS
page.content: There are two parks in our area. They are Hollywood and Alexandra. Alexandra is a very clean park and it has a lot of very pretty flowers in it. There is also a bowling green, crazy golf, tennis courts, a playground and padling pool. Hollywood Park is very different because it is very hilly whereas Alexandra is very flat. Hollywood hasn't got as many things as Alexandra but it has got bowling greens, playgrounds, and rope swings which people have made and we have lots of fun on them. Alexandra and Hollywood are near enough the same size as each other but we can't really tell. We enjoy going to Alexandra the best because of the crazy golf and the other games to play. The gardeners keep the gardens and greens in beautiful condition for everyone to enjoy.
